:bulb: You can navigate directories using the command line.<br>
:bulb: You can use shortcuts like the tilde or dots to navigate your file system.<br>
:bulb: You can explain the difference between absolute and relative paths.<br>
:bulb: You can use arguments and flags to modify command-line commands.<br>
:bulb: You understand the concept of wild cards (`*`) and can use it for system navigation.
